column6: "Having barely survived their first mission as a team, Rogue's squad immediately find themselves up against another new mysterious threat! What does the man called Pan want with the X-Men, and what is he willing to do to get it?!
column8: | writer:Mike Carey | inker:Carlos Alberto cruz Cuevas | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Humberto Ramos
